#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <string.h>
#include <math.h>

int main() {
    int N;
    scanf("%d", &N);
    struct point {
        int x, y;
    };
    struct point *points = malloc(N * sizeof(struct point));
    for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
        scanf("%d %d", &points[i].x, &points[i].y);
    }

    double sum = 0.0;
    for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
        for (int j = 0; j < N; j++) {
            if (i == j) continue;
            int dx = points[i].x - points[j].x;
            int dy = points[i].y - points[j].y;
            double dist = sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);
            sum += dist;
        }
    }
    double avg = sum / N;

    // Convert avg to string
    char avg_str[20];
    sprintf(avg_str, "%.10g", avg);

    // Process second program's logic
    int len = strlen(avg_str);
    int *digits = malloc((len + 1) * sizeof(int));
    for (int i = 0; i <= len; i++) {
        digits[i] = 0;
    }
    for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
        char c = avg_str[len - 1 - i];
        digits[i] = c - '0';
    }

    int bills = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i <= len; i++) {
        if (digits[i] == 10) {
            digits[i + 1]++;
            digits[i] = 0;
        }
        if (digits[i] < 5) {
            bills += digits[i];
        } else if (digits[i] == 5) {
            if (digits[i + 1] >= 5) {
                digits[i + 1]++;
            }
            bills += 5;
        } else {
            digits[i + 1]++;
            bills += 10 - digits[i];
        }
    }
    free(digits);

    // Convert bills to string
    char bills_str[20];
    sprintf(bills_str, "%d", bills);

    // Process third program's logic
    int len_x = strlen(bills_str);
    char a[len_x + 1];
    strcpy(a, bills_str);
    int a1 = 0;
    for (int i = 1; i < len_x; i++) {
        if (a[i] == a[i - 1]) {
            if (a[i] == '1') a[i] = '0';
            else a[i] = '1';
            a1++;
        }
    }

    char b[len_x + 1];
    strcpy(b, bills_str);
    int a2 = 0;
    for (int i = len_x - 1; i > 0; i--) {
        if (b[i] == b[i - 1]) {
            if (b[i - 1] == '1') b[i - 1] = '0';
            else b[i - 1] = '1';
            a2++;
        }
    }

    int result = (a1 < a2) ? a1 : a2;
    printf("%d\n", result);

    free(points);
    return 0;
}
